content: Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked 4w agoWhat are the odds that my KEPPEL DC Preferential Offering application will be successful?I just received Keppel DC REITs Preferential Offering letter. I am considering to apply for excess new units. What are the chances that my application would succeed? I was thinking to apply 3 to 4x of my allocated new units...Any opinions?Thanks in advance!1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Tag Team Member at Kenichi Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered 3w agoWe won't have any idea how they will allocate for excess. Just apply and pray for luck.
Usually, they will allocate first to allow those with odd lots to round off. Any other excess is really based on luck.0 comments0
